name: FlowPlay
overview:
FlowPlay is a developer of browser-based virtual world technology. It’s platform allows rich animation and user interaction on any Flash-enabled browser.

Founder and CEO Derrick Morton left RealNetworks in September 2006 to start the company with partners Douglas Pearson and Christian Oestlien.

The Company’s first product is ourWorld.com – an online destination that aggregates hundreds of third party games into a virtual world with over 16,000 virtual goods. As of July 2009, ourWorld had 2.5 million registered users and was primarily distributed through partners such as Miniclip and the Spil Group.

Competitors include Gaia Online, Faketown and Habbo Hotel.

funding_rounds.source_description: FlowPlay raises $3.7M for avatar game for teenagers - Venturebeat
